homepage.translation[0].definitions[0].d: the first page of a website, which often contains links to other pages on that website
homepage.translation[1].definitions[0].d: the part of an Internet WEBSITE that contains all the basic information about a person or an organization. The homepage is the first place you go to on a website, and it is the place from which you can go to all other areas
homepage.translation[1].definitions[1].d: the page that you have chosen to appear when you first connect to the Internet
